readingMnemonic: You're being <kanji>boisterous</kanji> and having your <kanji>miso</kanji> outside when suddenly someone shoves <reading>so</reading>ap (そ) in your mouth. "Even your mask can't hide that boisterous miso-eating. Quiet down and wash your mouth out with that soap!" they yell.
meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>mouth</radical> is wearing a <radical>mask</radical> so people won't realize you're the one being so <kanji>boisterous</kanji> as you eat your <kanji>miso</kanji>. If you cover your mouth with this mask, no one will know you're such a boisterous eater of miso.
